name: Tessa
headline: AI coworkers with human-like skill acquisition and mastery
description:
Tessa is an AI coworker that can autonomously learn and master the usage of web-based tools, just like a human does. 

To accomplish this, we are building a novel neural architecture that enables autonomous self-improvement in AI agents. So far, we've achieved a state-of-the-art success rate of 93% on the WebVoyager benchmark.

We are working to automate workflows in several verticals, including property management & real estate, financial services, and consulting.
tags: industry:hard-tech; industry:reinforcement-learning; industry:automation; industry:ai; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Harvey Hu, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CTO of Tessa. Previously machine learning engineer at Google & TikTok, designing recommendation algorithms for billions of users. I love models, probabilities, and solving complex impactful problems

founders.name: Mo Nasir, Founder & CEO
founders.description:
Co-founder and CEO of Tessa, an AI coworker that can learn and master new skills like a human does. Previously worked on self-driving cars at NVIDIA.

Chinese loose leaf tea connoisseur üçµ

raw_markdown="[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/677b1f69a40b89e5879987fc_Website%20Logo%20\(1\).svg)](https://heytessa.ai/</>)

[Early Access](https://heytessa.ai/<https:/forms.gle/mSgxFbRG3xWx2GNC7>)
# Better than a ‍Virtual Assistant
Meet Tessa, your 24/7 **star employee** that adapts to your needs and proactively self-improves
[Early Access](https://heytessa.ai/<https:/forms.gle/mSgxFbRG3xWx2GNC7>)
[Browse features](https://heytessa.ai/<#Features>)
Backed by
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/677604a411093ffdd643702a_YC.webp)
## Tessa's Superpowers
![Real Time Trading - Dark X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c8b_icon-1-features-dark-template.svg)
### Researches Autonomously 
With a state-of-the-art 93% accuracy on the WebVoyager benchmark, Tessa can use any webpage like a human
![Press - Dark X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33d18_icon-3-contact-categories-dark-template.svg)
### Manages Your Calendar and Inbox
Integrated with Google Calendar, Gmail, and Google Drive
![Stocks - Dark X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c8f_icon-4-features-dark-template.svg)
### Integrates With Your Knowledge Base
Reads large files with ease, and learns processes and procedures in your business
![Email Icon - Dark X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33cfe_icon-career-apply-job-dark-template.svg)
### Mirrors Your Writing Style (coming soon)
Learns your unique writing style and writes in your voice
![Currencies - Dark X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c90_icon-5-features-dark-template.svg)
### Learns to Use Your Tools (coming soon)
Learns from observations and user feedback
![No Commission - Dark X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33ce9_icon-2-features-dark-template.svg)
### Automates Your Workflow (coming soon)
Show Tessa once and it will take it from there
[Early Access](https://heytessa.ai/<https:/forms.gle/mSgxFbRG3xWx2GNC7>)
[See Examples](https://heytessa.ai/<#Examples>)
## Make A Dinner Reservation
Hey Tessa, reserve a table for 5 around 7pm next Friday at Teleferic Barcelona.
![Desktop And Mobile - Dark X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33ceb_icon-3-features-dark-template.svg)
### UI Based
Understands text, images, and forms just like a human
![Real Time Trading - Dark X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c8b_icon-1-features-dark-template.svg)
### Step-by-Step Control
Pause or stop the agent at any point
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/677835904a841fe4b94ea7ec_Screenshot%202025-01-03%20at%2011.07.46%E2%80%AFAM.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/67783901a9d87a71c5b77375_Screenshot%202025-01-03%20at%2011.22.25%E2%80%AFAM.png)
## Trademark Research
Hey Tessa, I am evaluating these names for an AI startup. For each name, first go to tmsearch.uspto.gov to confirm if there are artificial intelligence related trademarks on it, then go to GoDaddy to check if any related domains are available for buying. Report available options and the price. 
![Gear - Dark X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33ced_icon-9-features-dark-template.svg)
### Automate repetitive processes
Navigate information-dense websites with ease
## Plan Your Upcoming Travel with Ease
What's the price of The Jay, Autograph Collection SF on March 9th, 2025? Go to booking.com and click through all the steps to give me the final price after taxes and fees
![Unlimited PTO - Dark X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33cf0_icon-1-careers-perks-dark-template.svg)
### Hands Free Process
Tessa will try her best to find out what you need and gets back to you. No need to babysit. 
![Stocks - Dark X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33cea_icon-7-features-dark-template.svg)
### No Games
Tessa acts on your behalf and helps you get around onerous processes to get the final cost
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/677833fa99b7754483f03420_Screenshot%202025-01-03%20at%2011.00.19%E2%80%AFAM.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/67787ebf9727a85f07162136_ParkingTicket.png)
## Pay Your Parking Ticket With Just A Photo
Hey Tessa, look at this parking ticket. Identify important information like where to pay and citation number. Then pay it for me.
![Encryption - Dark X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c9c_icon-3-home-perks-dark-template.svg)
### Securely Handle Payments
Environment variable based approach keeps your sensitive information safe
![Security - Dark X Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c9a_icon-4-home-perks-dark-template.svg)
### Native Optical Character Recognition
No need to spell out the details, just take a photo
## Join the waitlist today!
[Sign Up](https://heytessa.ai/<https:/forms.gle/mSgxFbRG3xWx2GNC7>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6769ba454f0c6dd989d33c1c/677b1f69a40b89e5879987fc_Website%20Logo%20\(1\).svg)](https://heytessa.ai/</>)[](https://heytessa.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/heytessa/>)

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Tessa**

Tessa is a forward-thinking AI company dedicated to creating intelligent coworkers that learn and master tasks as a human would. Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator Batch W25, this San Francisco-based startup is on a mission to revolutionize the way we work by embedding AI into our daily workflows.

At its core, Tessa stands out for its innovative approach: it employs a novel neural architecture designed for autonomous self-improvement in AI agents. The results so far are impressive, boasting a remarkable 93% success rate on the WebVoyager benchmark‚Äîa clear sign of its capabilities.

The company is laser-focused on automating workflows across various sectors, notably in property management and real estate, financial services, and consulting. With a team of only two‚Äîcurrently operating with the nimbleness of a startup‚ÄîTessa is poised for serious growth.

### Key Features:
- **Autonomous Research**: Tessa can navigate any webpage with near-human proficiency.
- **Integration Capabilities**: It connects seamlessly with tools like Google Calendar, Gmail, and Google Drive, helping users manage their schedules and communications efficiently.
- **Knowledge Management**: Tessa reads and learns processes from extensive documents, making it invaluable for organizations that deal with large amounts of information.
- **Writing Style Adaptation**: Coming soon, Tessa will learn your unique writing style and produce content in your voice.
- **Workflow Automation**: Soon, just showing Tessa a task will allow it to replicate that work autonomously.

### Use Cases:
Imagine telling Tessa to make a dinner reservation or conduct trademark research for an AI startup. It can handle the steps for you, finding results and reporting them back without needing constant supervision. With capabilities that also include processing payments through OCR technology, Tessa is built to take on your most tedious tasks.

With the backing of Y Combinator and a strategic focus on hard-tech and automation, Tessa is not just another AI assistant‚Äîit's positioned as a true coworker ready to redefine productivity.

For early access and to learn more, check out [Tessa's website](https://heytessa.ai). 

In a world where AI is often seen as a replacement for human workers, Tessa defies that perception by positioning itself as a powerful augmentation of human capabilities. What does that mean for the future? Well, it‚Äôs not just about working harder; it‚Äôs about working smarter‚Äîtogether.
